books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.
books.name: THE RETURN

books.author: by Jim Butcher
books.description: The 17th book in the Dresden Files series. Harry must save Chicago from destruction by the Last Titan.
books.name: BATTLE GROUND

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: In a prequel to “The Pillars of the Earth,” a boatbuilder, a Norman noblewoman and a monk live in England under attack by the Welsh and the Vikings.
books.name: THE EVENING AND THE MORNING

books.author: by Lana Del Rey
books.description: A collection of poems by the singer and songwriter.
books.name: VIOLET BENT BACKWARDS OVER THE GRASS

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After surviving a plane crash, a death doula travels to Egypt to reconnect with an old flame who is an archaeologist.
books.name: THE BOOK OF TWO WAYS

books.author: by James Patterson and J.D. Barker
books.description: A detective and an F.B.I. agent are baffled by a cross-country killing spree.
books.name: THE COAST-TO-COAST MURDERS

books.author: by Kyle Mills
books.description: When America’s power grid is shut down, Mitch Rapp goes after a cyber terrorist.
books.name: VINCE FLYNN: TOTAL POWER

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
books.name: ANXIOUS PEOPLE

books.author: by Brit Bennett
books.description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
books.name: THE VANISHING HALF

books.author: by Naomi Novik
books.description: While others expect a dark sorceress to cause damage, she has other plans.
books.name: A DEADLY EDUCATION

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: The 31st book in the Argeneau series. Can Joshua James Simpson Guiscard accept Ildaria Garcia as a life mate?
books.name: IMMORTAL ANGEL

books.author: by Joanne Fluke
books.description: As the holidays approach, a fresh batch of mystery and misadventure is served up to Hannah Swensen.
books.name: CHRISTMAS CUPCAKE MURDER

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The fifth book in the Cormoran Strike series. A decades-old cold case might be connected to a serial killer; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: TROUBLED BLOOD

books.author: by Ruth Ware
books.description: An avalanche tests the bonds of coworkers from a London-based tech startup on a corporate retreat in the French Alps.
books.name: ONE BY ONE

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY
